thread.title: Great Location for Excel
thread.title_full: Great Location for Excel - Review of Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MazieH
title: Great Location for Excel
text: We stayed here as we were exhibiting at Excel and our room was very clean, nicely presented, comfortable and staff were very friendly. The location to Excel is great as it is a short walk to the Exhibition Centre. You are also Close to City Airport and the Docklands Light Railway. Our room was fairly close to the track and the airport so there was some noise but nothing too intrusive.
